text: Kubantu bakwaMidiyani, (Sathumela) umzalwana wabo uShu’ayb. Yena wathi (kubo): “Hini na bantu bakuthi! Nqulani uAllâh! Aninaye omnye uthixo ngaphandle kwaKhe.” Inene umqondiso ocacileyo ovela eNkosini yenu ufikile kuni; ke nikani umlinganiselo wesikali opheleleyo nobunzima obupheleleyo, ningaboni abantu ezintweni zabo, ningenzi butshinga emhlabeni emva kokuba ucwangciswe ngendlela, oko kolunga kuni, ukuba ningamakholwa
